com.juraj.hdbs.querying

Class GlobalQueryFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.juraj.hdbs.querying.GlobalQueryFactory

  • public class GlobalQueryFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    Factory class for creation of global queries from a GlobalSQL query text
    Author:
    Juraj

      • createSelect

        public static GlobalSelectQuery createSelect(java.lang.String queryText,
                                             GlobalSchema globalSchema,
                                             MetadataDb metadataDb)
                                      throws QueryCreationException
        Returns a newly created GlobalSelectQuery object by lexing, parsing and semantically analyzing the given query text
        Parameters:
        queryText - Text of a query written in GlobalSQL
        globalSchema - Current global schema
        metadataDb - Meatadata database service
        Returns:
        GlobalSelectQuery object
        Throws:
        QueryCreationException - Thrown on syntax or semantic errors

      • createSelectQueryObject

                                                         GlobalSchema globalSchema)
        Helper method that instantiates a GlobalSelectQuery object after a successful analysis
        Parameters:
        ctx - Select query context of the GlobalSQL parser
        globalSchema - current global schema
        Returns:
        GlobalSelectQuery object
